website_summaries.verdict: The Epson WorkForce 610 meets the needs of both businesses and home offices that are shopping for a competent, dependable all-in-one device. Whether it's printing, faxing, copying, or scanning, this Epson is a cut above the competition.
pros: Rapidly prints graphical and text documents

customer_reviews.title: EPSON FOREVER PRINTER.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this printer for almost six years now. I have used epson ink, remanufactured ink, and generic ink. They have all worked for me, and I have printed thousands of pages. The machine is still working just the same as when I bought it. I have been considering a new machine, but since this one works so good, and the ink is so cheap, I can find no reason to get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Luther L. Karr

customer_reviews.title: Broke twice in 3 months and had to send back (but epson did replace for free)
customer_reviews.text: So the printer is ok, but it has started to malfunction again. The first time I was sent a replacement and I just got off the phone with help desk and they will send another replacement. Something malfunctions and the paper gets sucked in suddenly very violently and by only one corner, ripping it and getting ink everywhere. when it works, its fine. The scanner's great, even photos scan well. But something is off with this model. Epson does exchange the broken one for a free working printer, but it's the second time in 3 months, and it's a pain.
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, Quick, Great results!
customer_reviews.text: Quick setup on family wireless network. Requires setup with CD at each PC that uses it. Produces very fast, beautiful prints of black & white, or color. Noise would only be a problem if I put in in my bedroom, and was trying to sleep. I'm waiting for included ink cartridges to run out, when I will install a continuous ink system, but we have been printing for 3 months on first set of cartridges! Scanning is good quality, and easy to send to PCs that are setup on system. Haven't used Fax function because we got rid of our land line. Very happy with Purchace (under [...] with free shipping).
customer_reviews.author: tim Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid machine
customer_reviews.text: This printer was very easy to set up and works as advertised. In general is fast and the printing quality is very good. Inks don't seem as bright as HP's on regular bond paper but not a hinder for overall printout quality. Scanner and copy functions work nicely and fax machine is also convenient to use. Networking thru my router is great. All devices at home print to this printer now! Even dough it is a little noisy, I still don't know how many pages the ink cartridges will produce in average but expect to pay less per page than I did with my old HP printer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moncada

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer
customer_reviews.text: First, the setup instructions could have been clearer for wireless as this was my first wireless printer. As for the reviews about the unit making too much noise, it makes less noise than my previous Dell printer. I do not view noise as an issue at all for us. The speed is faster than my Dell. As two of us use the printer, we keep it on and it goes to sleep. This could be why some folks report it as printing slower than the Epson 600 because it takes a few seconds to wake up. The print quality is excellent. I am very satisfied with the Epson 610.
customer_reviews.author: KennyR

customer_reviews.title: bad paper feeder
customer_reviews.text: 2 of 2 Epson 610 printers failed in the same way: ADF takeup rollers were not feeding the paper. Video is at youtube eEGgo3QLTZA and month by month it got worse. Epson offered to replace printer, 2nd printer failed the same way. Bought a Fujitsu scansnap s1300i for its good reviews for its feeder, and it does 2sided in 1pass which this Epson 610 can't. Sorry I gave up on Epson. And the noisy printer/scanner was indeed a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Excellent complete wireless printer
customer_reviews.text: Due to my own inexperience in creating a home network that easily ties together Windows 7, vista and XP computers, and the need for my wife to work from notebook anywhere in the house, we felt that a wireless printer was necessary. I found this printer to be very easy to set up and install into our secured network. It is not fast, but handles all our needs as a home machine. I would recommend this as a good budget printer.
customer_reviews.author: Tom, the Squirrel Whisper

customer_reviews.title: Noise
customer_reviews.text: Most everything about this printer has been positive. The only issue I have with it is the noise it generates. The worst is at the moment that the printer begins feeding a sheet of paper. I'm not exaggerating when I say that it sounds like a grappling hook latching onto an auto thats about to be dropped into a compactor. The rest of the functioning is above the noise level I've been used to with previous HP printers, but is at least acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ford

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast!
customer_reviews.text: Great printer. Was super easy to set up, basically plug-n-play! Has very nice quality prints and photos. The auto document feeder is the best thing since sliced bread. I know they've had them for a long time, but the prices are reasonable now. Scan time is very fast compared to my other Epson 3 in 1. Don't use the fax feature at all, maybe someday. All-in-all an excellent piece of equipment for the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: R. Short

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this printer since October 2010 and I'n so glad that I purchased it! It was time to upgrade from our dinosaur Epson C-60 Stylus. The Epson Workforce 610 is easy to use too! It has lots of bells and whistles! I'm sure some people think you need an HP or a Lexmark but try an Epson! Please use good quality ink if you buy a product like this!
customer_reviews.author: fab4gal

customer_reviews.title: Caveat Emptor!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Workforce 610 printer (Now discontinued by Epson) some 2 years ago. I used it as a backup printer, and it has hardly been used. After only "2 black cartridges used", it dies on me. Epson Tech Support advised me to save money and buy a new printer instead of repairing this one. I have seen this printer sold nowadays for x2.5 its original price. Based on my experience, see the title of my review!
customer_reviews.author: Reuven

customer_reviews.title: Epson 610 workforce printer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 610 multi-function printer a few weeks ago. I have the printer connected directly to a PC versus a wireless connection since the wireless in our house is not robust. I have been execptionally happy with the print quality. I've used the copy capabilities of the printer multiple times and am happy with the built in feeder. Overall the device is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Priner for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This printer is a bit noisy, but the speed and quality of the output is worth a bit of noise. The WiFi set up was so easy. I connected three commputers and each has a different OS. Not one problem. Not the case with other devices that I use with the wireless network. I also like the LED screen that pretty much tells and guides you through all the functions. Printing directly from the card reader and scanner is so handy. Before you plop down more money for ink for your old printer, think about replacing it with a new all in one WiFi for about the same price as buying just the ink.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, yet full-featured.
customer_reviews.text: What a pleasure to get a new printer, at a bargain price, AND it actually has the high-capacity ink cartridges in the box, rather than the half-full ones that competitors often ship with their new devices. Setup on the network was quick and easy, and it just works as advertised. Windows required a driver, of course. With Linux Mint 9 (an Ubuntu derivative) it just works, with no additional downloads.
customer_reviews.author: Meep70

customer_reviews.title: Epson Workforce Printer ROCKS
customer_reviews.text: this printer is the best thing going - had a miserable time with a Dell printer and not much more fun with an HP; this printer is a gem to install and a pleasure to have around - is efficient in cost-per-copy, does all of it's marketed functions very well and does great work for those of us who are good at using stuff that works but maybe not so gifted on the IT side....
customer_reviews.author: Sharon T

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up
customer_reviews.text: I just got the 610. So far this is a very simple set up. I was on-line without a hitch. Very easy to understand instructions. The test print was really nice too. I just hope it will work well with my Windows 7, I read a review that said it did not scan to Windows 7, we will see, I will update this review as I gain experience. But the price is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday home use
customer_reviews.text: I have had this Epson WorkForce 610 for over a year and a half now and it works great. We use if for every day home use, not for photos or any professional use. It is wireless. Prints quickly and seldom if ever gets a paper jam. For just under $100 it is worth what you pay for. It doesn't burn through the ink like some cheaper printers do.
customer_reviews.author: debbersvm

customer_reviews.title: Well worth your investment.
customer_reviews.text: I received this item as a gift after my Lexmark 6170 went down. I am so happy with it. Not only was it easy to set up. It is stylish also, fits quit well into my office. I have had 2 Lexmarks prior to this Epson but the Ink Cartridges were costing me an arm and a leg. The cartridges for the Epson to replace are very reasonable and will save loads of money. The copies/pictures come out beautiful. I would definately reccomend this Epson WorkForce 610 to those looking for a good All-In-One machine. It has all the Bells and Whistles that the HIGH priced machines have at half the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi Ramone'

customer_reviews.title: This machine is garbage!
customer_reviews.text: I've never written a bad review for a product before, but this machine is way beyond poor. We have lost two of these machines to paper jams that couldn't be repaired, and talking to their customer service is a frustrating and unproductive experience. The set up is easy, and the print quality is fine. From a dependability standpoint however the printers are a zero. It is safe to say that we will never buy another Epson printer, and hope others will follow suit. It's a poor, poor product regardless of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Abbott

customer_reviews.title: It just WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I have never reviewed anything, anywhere online but the time has come. This is simply the best printer I have ever had. I have seen reviews about scanning problems so that is the last thing I tried but my fears were unfounded. Without manuals or tutorials, I followed my intuitions, the printer found my Mac on the wireless network, scanned the document (offers JPG or PDF format) and filed it on my computer. Faxing, Copying and, of course, Printing all work perfectly and with the same ease. It is thriftier on ink than my Canon i-960 was. Simply put, I believe this may be the best price/performance value available today.
customer_reviews.author: Since42

customer_reviews.title: Heavy ink user, software installs for Windows 7 64-bit are flaky
customer_reviews.text: This is a discontinued model, so check reviews for latest Epson WorkForce printers. Always having problems with one or another of our three laptops being able to print to this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Gibney

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these printers because they are easy to install and use. However, both printers quit working after less than a year due to faulty paper feeding and paper jams. I would not recommend this product. For the price, it should be sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Printer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to configure on my network. Prints comes out flawlessly. Bummer that Epson is so mercenary with their toner, but if you print a lot, I HIGHLY recommend getting a laser printer. You will save a fortune in toner costs. Scanner configures nicely on my Mac using Image Capture.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best inkjet printer money can buy. It's as fast as some laser printers and it has zero-time dry ink, so goodbye to smudges. It also has fax and a top load copier, which is iften missing from all in one printers. You absolutely can't lose by buying this cost effective printer.
customer_reviews.author: CRAIG C BAILEY

customer_reviews.title: I love this printer
customer_reviews.text: I got the printer in early January 2011 and I love it. It works great!! It was easy to setup and works from every room of the house. I use PCs but my brother uses a mac. We both printed via wireless connection without any problems. A lot of reviews that i read about wireless printers seemed to have issues with scanning wireless. I didn't have any trouble scanning on The Epson Workforce 610. Have not used it long enough yet to know how long the ink last, but I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennybean

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRINTER!
customer_reviews.text: Had this printer for almost 2 years. Usde it VERY lightly, maybe 2 or 3 times a month. Turned it on one day and it displayed an error message to contact Epson. All they would do for me is give me an address to a repair shop and I would have to pay for it to be fixed. Very frusterating!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurena Blakeman

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep it short... This printer is great! Easy to set up, easy to use! Works like a charm with absoltely no issues! I saw the negative reviews prior to my purchase - so I was aprehensive - luckily, my experience is nothing like those!
customer_reviews.author: Robert's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Best printer I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer. I have had it for years now and I can't say enough good things about it
customer_reviews.author: Matriarch

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it !!! I can't believe how well it works. Far better than the HP I have on my desk at work. ALWAYS feeds the paper without a flaw, and the color is at Epson's best.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A. Sears

customer_reviews.title: I have 3 of these Epsons!
customer_reviews.text: I have 1 in my home office, 1 in my downtown office and 1 in my other office! Every one of them work perfectly... I have never had a problem and would recommend the Epson brand to anyone who was looking for a new printer.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer
customer_reviews.text: Best printer I ever owned. The automatic feed went out after about 3 years. but all other functions work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Epson Workforce 610
customer_reviews.text: I have used this printer for about a month. So far it has done everything I want it to do quite efficiently. I have not used the fax feature but have printed both color and black and white and have used the scan function.
customer_reviews.author: Mary G. Kinman

customer_reviews.title: Wireless set up very difficult then unit is great
customer_reviews.text: Getting the printer to consistently receive the signal from my router required three phone calls to Epson and two to Router mfgr. Solution was to slow down router in order to recognise g and b. Scanning was impossible until tech from Epson solver problem on second call. Once these problems were solved, the unit works fine and I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Sea2Ease

customer_reviews.title: good network printer
customer_reviews.text: good network printer currently hooked up to wired ethernet cable, works just like it should. the downside is its kind of loud when it starts a print job. also since the paper feed is almost vertical on back of unit the sheets will over time warp a little depending on humidity. thus far it works well i'm just used to printer where the sheets lay flat in a tray below.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dembeck

customer_reviews.title: Cruddy
customer_reviews.text: This printer worked excellent for one whole year, then it got out of alignment and I was expected to pay $65.00 just to have it LOOKED at. I ended up recycling it at a computer store. I will NEVER buy an Epson again-ever!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Epson WF 610
customer_reviews.text: So far - so good = I replaced a WF 310 after one year of reliable use - The 310 crashed on me and I couldn't correct the probllem without investing more than the printer was worth - The 610 was easy to set up and the speed was faster than the 310 - Print quality is excellent and if there are no crashes I will be very happy with this printer. The price was very competitive. Overall an excellent rating.
customer_reviews.author: Bob H.

customer_reviews.title: Printer works great
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. This is a multi-function printer copy fax and meets all of my needs. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Domo

customer_reviews.title: Great printer!
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I want it to do. It was hard to set up due to the fact it was used and trying to figure out the wireless code was a bit difficult. I called Epson direct and they helped me and got me up and running free of charge. Works great now! I just wish these things could be fixed instead of throwing these things away every time the slightest goes wrong with them.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Ye

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and great printer
customer_reviews.text: I came from a dinosaur printer to the work force 610. I absolutely love this printer/fax/copier/scanner!! The shipping was super fast as well. The only thing I wish this printer had was the 2-sided page printer where it flipped the paper automatically instead of doing it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Epson Wireless C610 Printer
customer_reviews.text: Printer worked just fine after following instructions. It has been a great printer in the short time I have used it. One thing for sure I will never go back to a hard wired printer. Wireless is the way to go. I now have all of my four computers hooked up to this printer. I would recommend it to anyone. Satisfied in Utah. AR
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Reynoso

customer_reviews.title: Epson is Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Only made it through 1 set of ink cartridges and had to be replaced. Factory replaced and that one lasted just long enough to make it through warranted time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have been trying to return it for some time NOW it is defective
customer_reviews.text: I found that this item is defective & have been trying to return it but teh seller seem to not wish to return my effort to e mail him as not I would not recommend to any one but from this person
customer_reviews.author: James R Becker

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer/Great Price...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the printer for a few weeks and it's great. Easy to setup - I have it hooked into my wireless network so I can print from anywhere, scan from anywhere... great interface. The only feature I haven't used yet is fax, but everything else for everyday printing is great. Wouldn't recommend a high quality photo printer, but it's great for a home office/every day use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Great all arounder
customer_reviews.text: Great item, especially for that price. The wireless-ness and the ADF are excellent features. The only thing that stopped me from giving it 5 stars is the lack of built in 'searchable PDF creation' support on the mac :(
customer_reviews.author: zakdigital

customer_reviews.title: I Like!
customer_reviews.text: Epson Printers are the best out there for the price, ink cartridges are also the lowest priced on the market. This is the reason I stay with Epson. Keep up the great work!
customer_reviews.author: J. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: wireless inkjet printer
customer_reviews.text: It is a wireless printer and excellent if you don't want to mess around with wires/cables. Works well, but uses lot of cartridge!
customer_reviews.author: SanSu

customer_reviews.title: Great printer for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had the printer out of the box and functioning across 4 PCs (1 XP, 2 Vistas & a Mac) in under an hour. I do not have a bad thing to say about this printer. Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Canzak

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it! Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Printer is about four months old. No longer working. Epson wants us to make a deposit ($179.00) in order for them to honor their warranty. This deposit is more than the printer is worth. It is also more money than we have to spare right now. This is the last Epson we will purchase. It is a bunch of junk. Very dissapointed. Don't buy it. It will be a big headache.
customer_reviews.author: Martin England

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: wireles and everything else!!!!!!!!!!! once you setup static ip the puter always gets the location right and prionts very quick every time!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Palgume

customer_reviews.title: This printer is great and only time it lets me down is when ...
customer_reviews.text: This printer is great and only time it lets me down is when I run out of ink. Clear, precise printing for photos and documents. I've had it for a while now, but, it still lives up to it's expectations.
customer_reviews.author: ARICHIE1

customer_reviews.title: all in one printer,fax,copier
customer_reviews.text: Recieved this machine in a very timely manner. Set up was easy. works great. the fax will not operate if you answer the telephone before it picks up. Otherwise no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph T. Ditter

customer_reviews.title: Great all in one for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Even has an option to print photoes from the Ipod or itouch. I dont need to use a printer/ scanner often but whenever I used it the job was done well. Also printed a full page photograph on regular paper and it printed it beautifully with no colour streaks or other defects.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: No more HP's
customer_reviews.text: My prior printers for the last 20 years were all HP. This is better in all respects. Better more intuitive software and setup. Ink costs about 1/2 as much and......... it just works! no more error messages and other assorted glitches. So pleased that I bought a 2nd! PM
customer_reviews.author: P. Mottner

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job, nice prints
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for my brother, he said it worked well and served his purposes.
customer_reviews.author: YIRMASTER

customer_reviews.title: AIO Printer
customer_reviews.text: The Epson Workforce 610 is working well for me so far. I like its relatively compact size, separate ink cartridges, and overall functionality. I also purchased a 3 year extended warranty just in case it should fail in the next 3 years. An extended warranty has proven valuable to me in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Goldbondwater

customer_reviews.title: awesome printer
customer_reviews.text: this is an awesome printer. it's light-weight and has a great look. print quality is amazing and for a very affordable price. i highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: dasma boy

customer_reviews.title: EPSON 610
customer_reviews.text: It was an easy purchase for me as I already had an EPSON 600 printer, I purchased the 610 because it has the extra large Black Ink Cartridge, I write a lot so I am not constantly changing cartridges, also it is very fast printing, I also had always used HPs, but they do not have the same results as EPSON, I'm sold. Gordon Melville North Hollywood
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Melville

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with my Epson Workforce Printer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this printer to replace another epson one. I am very pleased that I did. The print quality is great. I really like the wireless feature. With all the options... I need nothing else. Oh yeah... the price that I found on amazon.com was icing on the pretzel.
customer_reviews.author: T Polk

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine
customer_reviews.text: Fast, easy to use, durable. I use it for scanning doc to email. Super fast scanning. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd West

customer_reviews.title: Good printer
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this printer i could not be more satisfied. The printer works great for me in a secondary capacity for scanning and color printing, the color printing on this computer is quite impressive and it can print pictures very well. I use a bulk black and white printer for other needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I like it and acquire small space
customer_reviews.text: I like the printer easy to setup and connected anywhere from your house using wireless but little bit noisy. I bought it 2 month ago but I am not printing that much, i don't have any problem till now.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Rai

customer_reviews.title: Epson WorkForce 610
customer_reviews.text: I tried to buy this printer from Epson at the special $99.99 and it went out of stock while I was speaking with a sales rep. They wouldn't take my order and were nebulous about when it would be available. The sale price time window was about to run out so I called Amazon. They had it in stock for $99.99 and they gave me free shipping. This is a much better printer than Epson 9400FAX which is no discontinued. What I like is that it uses the same cartridges as the 9400. I'm happy with the printer and how quickly Amazon took care of business.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Summa

customer_reviews.title: Good printer / bad software
customer_reviews.text: The printer itself is quite good, but I've had a horrible time getting it to work reliably on Mac OSX Snow Leopard. I would go with another manufacturer with better Mac support.
customer_reviews.author: Aydin Ghajar

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: My HP Deskjet did not support Snow Leopard so I bought this. You have to download Snow Leopard software as included disk does not have it. After about 1/2 hour of jumping through hoops I got it to print. Copies good, fax phone cord connection is in area and position that is very hard to get to. Faxed ok, scan very hard set up, certainly not anything like an Apple product. When two of us worked on scanning set-up for an hour we got it working. scans are ok. BK
customer_reviews.author: billyk

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product was not what I expected. Used and did not meet my expectations .
customer_reviews.author: Allan McCray

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a WW-Fi for my business I love the fax feather. Very easy to use. Ink is easy to change.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J.  Abrahamson

customer_reviews.title: i should put zero stars, not one.
customer_reviews.text: the printer did not work, the black ink was not printing. it seems to me that before selling a refurbished printer one has to verify that it works, not that it is just shiny and clean. This was a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: luca bonardi

customer_reviews.title: Totally Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a work-horse, easy to set-up and works flawlessly every time. I have connected it to both MAC and Windows 7 computers and works fine and easy, without any compatibility issues. It is user-friendly. I would recommend this printer, every single day and twice on Sunday. It's by far the best printer you might get.
customer_reviews.author: MGartz (MA)

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little printer. We mainly use it for printing. The wireless component is very beneficial to us. Works well with our laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Psames

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: set up is a breeze, especially since u don't have to attach a usb cable to enable the wi fi. as for its quality printing and speed, i am very satisfied. i recommend this product highly.
customer_reviews.author: new york city

customer_reviews.title: Disppointment with this printer
customer_reviews.text: I had a Lexmark printer prior to buying this. The printer was still in excellent shape but I had a lot of trouble with the cartridges drying out much soon than they should have. So I decided to buy another one and thought that the Epson was a good deal. It is very noisey. The paper tray seems to rock everytime the paper is ready to print. It certainly is not the quality that the Lexmark was.
customer_reviews.author: beach bum19966

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one purchased,
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for myself in May 2010. Bought this one for my Mom in March 2011. Had issues with the print drivers but customer support helped solve that. I have been very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: J Klosky

customer_reviews.title: bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: no usb included. don't let the lunatics get away this any more. you buy at a price that you think is a valid comparison shopping price and instead your money is stolen. sony does this too. can't return it once you open it if shopped online. so you are stuck. set it up, plug it in.. woops you can't. time wasted, machine on the floor, unusable. then you have to go out and buy a cord? i think not. they will take my return via epson home office as i'll pester and presssure them to no end. and i'll never buy epson again. please do not let these companies continue to lie, cheat and steal from us.
customer_reviews.author: pantyboy

customer_reviews.title: Epson Workforce 610 is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Before I get started with my review I just want to let you know that this is my first printer. I have had my printer for 1-2 months. I have a macbook and a desktop that I use to print from. With this printer you have the option of printing wireless. I have chosen to print wireless from the desk top and laptop. I had very little problem with setting it up. And did not have any problems with compatibility to my macbook.
customer_reviews.author: Dios te bendiga

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Home Use All-in-One
customer_reviews.text: This printer is very simple to setup and operate. I am not very network savvy, but the wi-fi connection is extremely simple to setup. The only knock would be the initial noise when grabbing paper. But otherwise the print quality is great - from fast draft quality to clean photo quality. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jello - Tex

customer_reviews.title: epson 610
customer_reviews.text: Printer was simple to set up on network. Print quality is great but printer can be noisy and the scanner is really touchy as far as alignment. Other than that this is a great printer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Darin L. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Epson printer
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about the printer other than the noise. I have used it quite a bit and have had no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: TwinCamMan

customer_reviews.title: Super printer for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of the same printer. I have had mine for over a year and bought one for my sister because her last printer, not an Epson, died a horrible death. She loves it and has been printing up a storm. By far the best printer on the market at this price!
customer_reviews.author: ptolemy21

customer_reviews.title: Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Loving the wireless printer/scanner/copier. It does multiple pages for scanning as one document -- that's why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fung Prime

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This my second Epson printer and I love it. It lasts many years, does a terrific job, and when this one dies (many years from now) I will certainly buy another.
customer_reviews.author: sukin19

customer_reviews.title: good, but not specalized
customer_reviews.text: Jack of all trades, and master of none -except maybe print speed. have had this printer for about a month now, printing text on it regularly. Ink consumption has been quite good, getting close to needing to change the cartridges soon. easy set up, reliable thus far.
customer_reviews.author: ahixon

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth Epson printer, so setup was a breeze. This is my first that is also a copier and scanner, which made it a great value for the money. I mostly use the print feature. What first impressed me was the paper feeder, as older models often sent the paper through on an angle. With the Workforce 610 I trust that the paper will be squared up. Print quality is excellent. I am waiting to see how long the extra-capacity ink cartridges last, as I was fed up with the way my older model quickly sucked the ink out of the small cartridges. So far, this is the best Epson I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie

customer_reviews.title: Best printer I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I've had this printer for almost a year and it has exceeded my expectations. It works great always and it doesn't guzzle ink. Great at faxing, too.
customer_reviews.author: dear ol' Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this two years ago for my home office. I love it. It is still working great and it was a great deal for the price. Would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: ellen.nbs

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer works well with the new laptop I also bought from Amazon. Wi-fi capability is great and it works with my Ipod and it's FAST!!! Quality print too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Epson 610all in one
customer_reviews.text: Great printer (all in one) easy to hook up and use a bit noisy but we can live with that considering the product quality
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Wos

customer_reviews.title: Really recommended
customer_reviews.text: I paid only $$ 99.00 for it, so that speaks for itself. I like the wireless option and especially as my daughter can now print from her computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars all the way
customer_reviews.text: 5 star'd everything on this. Couldn't be happier! Went from HP all-in-one product to this one was like moving out of tent into a house.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Arlt

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: It's all you could want in a printer. Excellent price,know need to spend more. I'm well satisfied.....
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Overall extremely satisfied. It takes a little long to get going once it "sleeps" but otherwise I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and efficient
customer_reviews.text: For a mild techno-dufus, it was very easy to master, and does everything I want it to. And at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Hinckley

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The Epson Scan software included with this device does NOT support duplex scanning, a function that my Canon PIXMA MX700 performed rather nicely. Tried to scan using Microsoft Office Document Imaging but software could not initiate the Epson scanner. Called Epson support who acknowledged that duplex scanning is not supported by this machine. As for not being able to connect with Microsoft Office Document Imaging, they stated that this was Microsoft's problem, not theirs. Overall, I'm very disappointed that this product does not have the functionality of the comparably priced Canon PIXMA mX 700, the device I bought the Epson to replace. Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: 5261oh45

customer_reviews.title: Epson 610 Printer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent in all respects. Some may find the noise objectionable when the paper feeds but not noisy enough for me. Have had no problems with jams.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Flaucher

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all costs!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This printer is advertised as a business printer. It will not print business cards. Their tech support tells me that it is not designed for card stock. Imagine a business printer that doesn't print business cards!!! Do not buy this printer. Epson doesn't tell you this in the documentation or on their website. Tech support got an attitude and told me that it also doesn't say it will handle card stock. Avoid Epson!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Frances Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Attractive-compact machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my husband. He loves it! Just curious... When will he stop showing me everything he does on if!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Items r sent n received safely n according although boxes have been broken a little due to items (printer) original box. Happy with this seller
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This printer does everything! We love how fast it works and the quality it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Epson Workforce 610
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to receive this printer. It was very easy to connect it to my computer. I would recommend this to my friends .
customer_reviews.author: dede

customer_reviews.title: So far no problems; fast printing; good quality
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried to print any photos yet, but the text print quality has been very good and sharp. It's pretty noisy, but the print speed is great, and the size and shape of the printer is convenient and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Nan Olson Beeler

customer_reviews.title: save your money
customer_reviews.text: I no longer have this printer, I thought it was fine when I first purchased it but it always seemed to have problems. Then it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: SFG

product_meta.title: Epson WorkForce 610 Wireless Color Inkjet All-in-One Printer (C11CA50201)
product_meta.description:
This world’s fastest ink jet all-in-one brings you the speed you need to keep your business moving. Get the high performance features you need to create impressive brochures, client–ready reports or everyday invoices and documents. With built–in Wi–Fi and Ethernet networking, WorkForce 610 makes it easy to print wirelessly from one PC or multiple PC’s, whether it’s to print, copy, scan or fax. It boasts a 30–page Auto Document Feeder and ISO print speeds of 15 ISO ppm black/9.3 ISO ppm color – rated using ISO standard. Smudge, fade and water resistant prints mean you can print everyday documents for immediate distribution and handle them immediately when they come off the printer. And, it uses up to 70% less energy than a laser printer when printing daily jobs.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Power. Speed. Productivity. – This world’s fastest ink jet all-in-one1 brings you the speed you need to keep your business moving. Get the high performance features you need to create impressive brochures, client–ready reports or everyday invoices and documents. With built–in Wi–Fi and Ethernet networking, WorkForce 610 makes it easy to print wirelessly from one PC or multiple PC’s, whether it’s to print, copy, scan or fax. It boasts a 30–page Auto Document Feeder and ISO print speeds2 of 15 ISO ppm black/9.3 ISO ppm color – rated using ISO standard. Smudge, fade and water resistant prints mean you can print everyday documents for immediate distribution and handle them immediately when they come off the printer. And, it uses up to 70% less energy than a laser printer when printing daily jobs.3 





Professional quality without compromise

Print proposals with crisp, sharp text and brochures with pro quality color. With WorkForce 610, you always get exceptional quality, without sacrificing speed. This powerful performer boasts ISO print speeds2 of 15 ISO ppm black/9.3 ISO ppm color, which means it’s the world’s fastest all-in-one1 in its class.


Built–in Wi–Fi and Ethernet

Easily share your all–in–one with multiple computers. Use the Ethernet port for wired networking. Or, go wireless with convenient Wi–Fi networking.



Productivity for your busy pace

WorkForce 610 makes it easy to work more efficiently. Use the built–in, 30–page Auto Document Feeder to quickly copy, scan and fax stacks of documents. Fax important documents (in black–and–white or color) in as fast as 3 seconds per page. Store up to 60 numbers with the convenient speed dial list. With the included PC fax software, you can even send a fax right from your computer without having to print out the sheet and then fax it.4 It’s a great way to save time and paper!



Zero ink dry time

While many competitive inks often take several minutes to dry, prints made with instant–dry DURABrite® Ultra Ink allow you to share documents and photos immediately after printing. Prints are smudge, fade and water resistant. Now, it’s easier than ever to protect important documents.




Smart ink system

Individual ink cartridges give you control over ink usage. Replace only the cartridge you need! And, WorkForce 610 comes with a cost–efficient Extra High–capacity Black ink cartridge. Best of all, with DURABrite Ultra Ink, only one set of cartridges is necessary to print top quality documents or photos. There’s no need to spend additional money on optional photo inks.




Save energy, save paper

Saving is easy with WorkForce 610 — you save money, energy and paper. In fact, with manual, two–sided printing, you’ll save up to 50% of your paper supply.5 And, you can save energy too because WorkForce 610 uses up to 70% less power than a laser printer.3


Product protection you can count on

When you register your WorkForce 610, you get a two–year limited warranty and toll–free telephone support,6 plus access to an exclusive web site for business templates, "how–to" tutorials, other useful resources, and exclusive offers. The WorkForce 610 also includes quick product exchange. So, you can rest easy knowing you have dependable service and support.



Advanced MicroPiezo® print head technology

Advanced MicroPiezo print head technology, exclusively from Epson, ensures sharp, accurate ink placement, while optimizing print speeds. With "smart" nozzles, this powerful technology delivers droplets in as many as three sizes, some as small as two picoliters. So, you get laser quality text — fast! And, each print is made to last.



BE MORE INFORMED
The new international ISO print speed standard Print speed is critically important when buying a printer or all-in-one. But how do you compare print speeds when different manufacturers measure in different ways? Now you can. Much like the "MPG" ratings on new cars, there's now a new industry standard for measuring print speed, which allows for an "apples-to-apples" comparison between different printer models and brands. The International Organization for Standardization (widely known as ISO) developed this industry approved and internationally accepted standard, specifically for ink jet printers and all-in-ones. It measures "out of the box" (default) print speeds using "real world" printing scenarios, so you can be sure you're getting a product that performs at the speed you need.



Features/Benefits

 * Increase your productivity — save time with the world’s fastest all-in-one1 in its class
 * Speed through critical documents — ISO print speeds2 of 15 ISO ppm black, 9.3 ISO ppm color
 * Dependable — instant–dry ink for smudge, fade and water resistant prints; highlighter–friendly too
 * PC fax — save paper by faxing documents directly from your computer4
 * Easily share — Wi–Fi for wireless connectivity, and Ethernet for wired networking
 * Print three times as much — get about 3x more prints than with our standard 69 ink cartridges, when using the included 97 Extra High–capacity ink cartridge
 * Small footprint — takes up less space on your desk
 * Save energy — uses up to 70% less power than a laser printer3
 * Save paper — save up to 50% of your paper supply with manual, two–sided printing5
 * Get more done — 30–page Auto Document Feeder to quickly copy, scan or fax stacks of originals
 * High–speed faxing in black and color — as fast as 3 sec per page; speed dial storage up to 60 numbers; fax memory up to 180 pages
 * PC–free, borderless photos in a snap — 2.5" LCD and memory card slots for easy transfer of files
 * Individual ink cartridges — replace only the color you need
 * Product protection you can count on — 2–year limited warranty; phone support, without charge, for the life of the product; plus, access to exclusive templates, tutorials and offers with product registration6
 * Weight and Dimensions (W x D x H) — Weight: 18.3 lb, Printing: 18.1" x 22.1" x 12", Storage: 18.1" x 13.6" x 9.3"


Eco features

 * Uses up to 70% less power than a laser printer3
 * Save up to 50% of your paper supply with manual, two–sided printing5
 * ENERGY STAR® qualified
 * Designed to be Recycled7


Recommended Supplies 
Epson Ink Supplies 
69 DURABrite Ultra Black ink cartridge (T069120) 
69 DURABrite Ultra Cyan ink cartridge (T069220) 
69 DURABrite Ultra Magenta ink cartridge (T069320) 
69 DURABrite Ultra Yellow ink cartridge (T069420) 
69 DURABrite Ultra color multi–pack (3 colors) (T069520) 

Epson Paper Supplies 
Heavyweight 8.5 x 11 in, Matte Paper, 50 sheets (S041257) 
Photo Quality Inkjet Paper, 100 sheets (S041062) 
Premium Semi–Gloss Photo Paper 8.5 x 11 in, 20 sheets (S041331) 
Premium Glossy Photo Paper 4 x 6 in, 100 sheets (S041727) 



What’s in the Box

 * WorkForce 610 all–in–one
 * Instruction manual
 * CD-ROM with drivers and bonus software
 * Power cord
 * Telephone cord
 * 4 DURABrite Ultra Ink cartridges; one 97 Extra High–capacity Black ink cartridge and three 68 High–capacity color ink cartridges: Cyan, Magenta, Yellow


WorkForce products
Engineered for business.

Show the world what your business is made of with WorkForce, Epson’s exclusive line of printers and all–in–ones that are engineered for better business productivity. Get laser quality output at laser fast speeds for prints that reflect your success.





 1. Fastest in its class; 50% faster than the competition printing black text in default, single-sided mode, in accordance with ISO/IEC 24734. Compared to ink jet all-in-ones priced at $199 or less, as of September 2009, based on independent testing.
 2. ISO ppm is based on the new international standard for measuring print speed. Black and color print speeds are determined in default, single-sided mode in accordance with ISO/IEC 24734.
 3. Compared to the best selling monochrome and color multifunction laser printers available for $499 or less as of January 1, 2009. Actual power savings will vary by product model and usage.
 4. For sending faxes, on Windows® only.
 5. Some applications and/or functions, like two–sided printing, may not be supported by Mac.®
 6. One–year limited warranty to all purchasers; toll–free support and second–year warranty require registration within 60 days of purchase. With registration, Epson provides free customer phone support for the life of the product. Under warranty, calls are toll free. Offer valid only in the United States.
 7. See our website for convenient and reasonable recycling options at www.epson.com/recycle



Epson and MicroPiezo are registered trademarks, Epson Exceed Your Vision is a registered logomark and Better Products for a Better Future is a trademark of Seiko Epson Corporation. DURABrite and WorkForce are registered trademarks of Epson America, Inc. All other product and brand names are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of their respective companies. Epson disclaims any and all rights in these marks. Copyright 2009 Epson America, Inc. 6/09
